doc:
Luis Guzmán https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luis_Guzm%C3%A1n 0 Luis Guzmán (born August 28, 1956) is a Puerto Rican actor, who is known for his character work. For much of Guzmán's career, he has played character roles largely as sidekicks, thugs, and policemen. Guzmán starred in Steven Soderbergh's films, Out of Sight, The Limey and Traffic. He also starred in Paul Thomas Anderson's films, Boogie Nights, Magnolia and Punch-Drunk Love. He starred in the HBO original series How to Make It in America and the Netflix series Narcos. He also starred in the CBS medical drama Code Black, where he portrayed senior nurse Jesse "Mama" Salander. He also co-starred on Cameron Crowe's Roadies, a comedy-drama on Showtime, as Gooch, a seasoned crew tour bus driver. Luis_Guzmán ( born August_28_,_1956 ) is a_Puerto_Rican_actor , who is_known for his_character_work . For much of Guzmán 's_career , he has_played character_roles largely as sidekicks , thugs , and policemen . Guzmán starred in Steven_Soderbergh 's_films , Out of Sight , The_Limey_and_Traffic . He also starred in Paul_Thomas_Anderson 's_films , Boogie_Nights , Magnolia and Punch-Drunk_Love . He starred in the_HBO_original_series How to_Make It in America and the_Netflix_series_Narcos . He also starred in the_CBS_medical_drama_Code_Black , where he portrayed senior_nurse_Jesse_"_Mama_"_Salander . He also co-starred on Cameron_Crowe 's_Roadies , a_comedy-drama on Showtime , as Gooch , a_seasoned_crew_tour_bus_driver .
